info.name: FreeKick Green Style
info.description:
This style is based on the mazuffer's style for Freekick v2.0.1. I brought back grass and added a bit light to it;)
If you remember the old green FreeKick and can't get used your eyes to white site with new skills' colors, maybe you will like this style.
info.additionalInfo:
* 2013-10-11: Couple of minor fixes.
* 2013-08-13: Changed the color of tooltips background (to resolve problem of invisibility of inserted links).
* 2013-06-05: Fixed a table of candidates to Customized Cometitions.
* 2013-05-30: Fixed color of alternating rows - made by mazuffer.
* 2013-03-20: Improved look of page header, when headline is too long.
* 2013-03-12: New colors for the new icons in top right corner of the site (Show/Hide Results, GM Report, Site Help).
* 2012-12-05: Small update at home page.
* 2012-11-23: Adjusted colors of some buttons on new forum. Updated screenshots.
* 2012-05-25: Removed some gradients.
* Earlier: Many small improvements and experiments.
